General.Name: Finger Inc.
General.Description: Finger, Inc. provides smart phone financial solutions for banks. The company offers its solutions for digital firm banking, smart banking, non face?to-face finance, capital operation, external connection, internet payment, firm integrated fund management, personal fund management, firm banking, capital collection and distribution management, transaction information inquiry, financial information inquiry, public information inquiry, and other information inquiry. Finger, Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
